user.title: Create Secure Webhook
user.description:
Configure your secure webhook.

**IMPORTANT:** The 'Authentication Token' below is auto-generated. **Copy it now.**

You will **NOT** be able to view this token again after this step.

error.webhook_id_exists: This Webhook ID is already in use.
error.invalid_slug: Invalid ID. Use only lowercase letters, numbers, and underscores.

abort.webhook_id_exists: This Webhook ID is already registered.
